adDetails: Hello, I'm an experienced professional piano instructor with a master's degree in Music. I've played piano my whole life, and I'm very passionate in piano performances and teaching. My goal is to make the process of learning music fun while effective for every student. I also make sure to expose my students to different musical instruments; I think this is very important specially for children and those students who are still not sure what musical instrument they would like to master. My rate is $70 for 60 minutes. You can have weekly or bi-weekly sessions. Please drop me an email or call me at show contact info if you have any questions. If you leave me your phone number, I will call you as soon as I get a chance. Thanks for your interest.
